Text: track 17 is real, it's an extended version of the intro, not bad :D hope you guys enjoy this, gorillaz are one of those bands that are really affected by the harshness of mp3 conversion, flac forever!

when your listening to it on a 5.1 dts system, flac really matters, the biggest difference is in the percussion, the hi-hats and cymbals sound alot more clear, and the bass has a more of a hum than a wobble. personnaly i prefer listening to music on vinyl, but if i have to go digital i only go with flac
I appreciate this a lo! Thatk you so much HMVinyl. Best CD ripper on TPB.

@ex15, Nobody is doubting MP3 is here to stay...but just like there will always be cheap McDonald's burgers, fat girls, and camera-in-the-theater videos, there will always be those of us that prefer a nice filet mignon, hot skinny girls, and Blu-Ray.

Ces't la vie...
